#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>

#include <string>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

char input[1010];
string a, b;

void convert(long long k) {
	if(k == 1LL) b.push_back('1');
	else {
		convert(k >> 1LL);
		b.push_back((k & 1LL) + '0'); 
	}
}

int main() {
	int t; scanf("%d", &t);
	while(t--) {
		long long k;
		scanf("%s %lld", input, &k);
		a = input; b = ""; convert(k);
		if(a.size() < b.size()) swap(a, b);
		int i = a.size() - 1, j = b.size() - 1, res = 0;
		while(i >= 0 && j >= 0) {
			int sum = (a[i] - '0') + (b[j] - '0');
			sum += res; res = 0;
			if(sum > 1) {
				res = sum >> 1;
				sum = sum & 1;
			}
			a[i] = sum + '0';
			i--; j--;
		}
		while(res > 0) {
			if(i < 0) a = "0" + a, i = 0;
			int sum = (a[i] - '0') + res; res = 0;
			if(sum > 1) {
				res = sum >> 1;
				sum = sum & 1;
			}
			a[i] = sum + '0';
			i--;
		}
		printf("%s\n", a.c_str());
	}
	return 0;
}
